subject: Re: Order #SSN3562 confirmed
description_text:

Hiram Kellogg

conversations.body_text:
Hello

This is my second replay because I was not able to log into my ticket from my last email.

I have noticed that I was actually sent a set of Plus X pedals instead of the pro X ultra pedal I ordered. I downloaded the software and plugged the pedals in and they showed up as the plus model. Then I checked the box and it was indeed labeled plus X (see picture below). Please let me know how you can remedy this situation.

[image0.jpeg]
Thank you

Hiram Kellogg
Sent from my iPhone
Hi Cody Kellogg,    I'm terribly sorry for the delay in replying. Your parcel has now been dispatched. Here is your tracking link:  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=396147916271

Hello

Today I received the pro base plate that was missing from my order, however I still have only received the plus X pedals. Are you able to send me the correct pedals? I can return these if needed. Below is a picture of the label on the box.

[image0.jpeg]

Thanks

Cody
Sent from my iPhone
Hi Cody Kellogg,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will reship your order. Please provide a photo showing both the shipping label and this product tag.
Hi Cody Kellogg,      We have sent you a return label. Please ship the incorrect package back to us. Here is your new tracking number: 887167291485
